import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-event-component', templateUrl: './event-component.component.html', styleUrls: ['./event-component.component.css'] }) export class EventComponentComponent { teste: any[] = [ {nome : "Reuniao"}, {nome : "Jantar"} ]; }
